channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 20:18 Air alarm to the Kiev region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 20:18 Air alarm to the Kiev region follow the following messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 16:50 Auxiliary in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 16:50 Auxiliary in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 16:24 The threat of a shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Consider, the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
